resources.string: Touch the symbol to copy files from/to your computer.
If you turn on USB storage, some apps that you\'re using will stop and may be unavailable until you turn off USB storage.
Root Error: Did you grant root permissions to the app?
SU Error: SU executable not found! You cannot use this app without root access.
Root Error: Phone seems to be unrooted! You cannot use this application without root access.
Partition Error: No partitions found! Please configure the settings manually.
LUN file Error: File not found! You cannot use this app without root access.
Automatically connect the USB storage when the usb cable is plugged in.
Turns logging of this application on or off.
When deactivated no notification will appear in the statusbar anymore.
When deactivated no popups (toasts) will appear on the screen anymore.
Shows a warning before connecting the USB storage to prevent accidental use. (Note: Setting is not respected in automatic mode).
Vibrates upon change of the USB storage mode for the given time period in milliseconds.
Removes MTP from build.prop/persist.sys.usb.config (restored upon deactivation).
View/Change the paths to the SD-Card partitions.
View/Change the path to the SD-Ext partition (if you have one).
View/Change the path to the LUN-files.
